sets.name: Assault Vest
sets.description:
• Flare Blitz is a strong STAB move and enables Arcanine to defeat foes like Gholdengo, Corviknight, Meowscarada, and Breloom.
  • Close Combat is a good coverage move that allows Arcanine to handle Roaring Moon and Tyranitar.
  • Play Rough is an excellent option to deal with Goodra and Sableye.
  • Outrage can be used to handle Choice item Dragapult and Goodra.
  • Extreme Speed allows Arcanine to win some close matchups, like non-bulky Haxorus, and can be important against Iron Valiant and Espathra.
  • The HP EVs allow Arcanine to survive Earthquake from Adamant Choice Band Baxcalibur and Power Gem from Modest Choice Specs Flutter Mane. The Speed EVs outspeed Bold Corviknight, and the remaining EVs are put in Attack for maximum damage output.
  • An alternative EV spread of 116 HP / 144 Atk / 216 Def / 32 Spe can be run, allowing Arcanine to survive Giga Impact from Adamant Choice Band Slaking and Power Gem from Modest Choice Specs Flutter Mane.
  • Magnezone is the one foe with Sturdy that Arcanine should be careful with, yet it can manage to win against Choice Specs Magnezone if Arcanine starts with Extreme Speed instead of Close Combat or Flare Blitz.

sets.name: Lum Berry
sets.description:
• Sturdy is a valuable ability in the 1v1 metagame, giving Donphan a free turn to deal damage with its good offensive stats.
  • Lum Berry allows Donphan to beat Will-O-Wisp users such as stall Arcanine and Skeledirge, preventing burns and Donphan's Sturdy from breaking.
  • Counter makes use of Sturdy, retaliating against most physical attackers that Donphan cannot KO easily, such as Chien-Pao.
  • Encore traps opposing Pokemon such as Espathra and Swords Dance Iron Hands into setup moves and locks foes such as Ting-Lu into weaker moves.
  • Donphan can beat many physical attackers with Counter, although some prediction may be required versus Pokemon that have the option of using an attacking move, such as Swords Dance Haxorus and non-Choice item Meowscarada.
  • Gunk Shot can be used to deal with Fairy-types such as Sylveon and Azumarill. However, Azumarill with Defense investment can tank a Gunk Shot, so it's not always reliable.
  • Ice Shard gives Donphan priority and finishes off foes that are at low HP. It also gives Donphan a way to deal with Dragon- and Flying-types such as Salamence, Garchomp, and Dragapult.
  • Rock Tomb lowers the opposing Pokemon's speed, Speed, letting Donphan go first and pull off a potential Encore on foes such as Attack-boosted Great Tusk.
  • The HP and Defense EVs allow Donphan to tank an Outrage from Adamant Choice Band Haxorus, and maximum Attack ensures that Donphan can hit as hard as possible. The remaining EVs are put into Speed.
  • An alternative EV spread of 8 HP / 240 Atk / 8 Def / 252 Spe with a Jolly nature only allows Donphan to tank Jolly Choice Band Haxorus, but comes with a faster Encore and Earthquake. The spread gives Donphan the capability to naturally outspeed Pokemon such as Sylveon and Azumarill.

sets.name: Booster Energy (Speed)
sets.description:
• Bulk Up further boosts Great Tusk's naturally high Attack and Defense stats.
  • Booster Energy lets Great Tusk outspeed Meowscarada, Annihilape, and Corviknight.
  • Knock Off can be used to remove Choice items from Dragapult, Gholdengo, and Magnezone.
  • Great Tuskâ€™s EV spread allows for maximum Attack while still procuring the Speed boost from its Booster Energy. The HP investment increases Great Tusk's bulk and ensures its HP remains odd to have a better matchup against Leech Seed.
  • Due to Great Tusk's low Special Defense stat, it's weak to bulky special attackers such as Weakness Policy or Air Balloon Gholdengo and Skeledirge.
  • Great Tusk is strong against Pokemon that it is able to outspeed due to Booster Energy and should use a damaging move against Choice Specs Iron Bundle, Meowscarada, and Chien Pao.
